edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.tasks

Class QueryTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.tasks.QueryTask

  • public class QueryTask
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    Executes a query operation on a layer resource of a map service exposed by the ArcGIS Server REST API.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

        Returns:

      • execute

        public final Deferred execute(Query query,
               QueryTaskCallback callback)
        Executes a Query against an ArcGIS Server map layer. The result is returned as a FeatureSet. If the query is successful, the user-specified callback function is invoked with the result. A FeatureSet contains an array of Graphic features, which can be added to the map using Map.graphics.add(). This array will not be populated if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        query - - Specifies the attributes and spatial filter of the query.
        callback - - handler to be fired upon server response.
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • execute

        public final Deferred execute(Query query)
        Executes a Query against an ArcGIS Server map layer. The result is returned as a FeatureSet. If the query is successful, the user-specified callback function is invoked with the result. A FeatureSet contains an array of Graphic features, which can be added to the map using Map.graphics.add(). This array will not be populated if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        query - - Specifies the attributes and spatial filter of the query.
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • executeForCount

        public final Deferred executeForCount(Query query,
                       QueryTaskCountCallback callback)
        Get a count of the number of features that satisfy the input query. Valid only for layers published using ArcGIS Server 10 SP1 or greater. Layers published with earlier versions of ArcGIS Server return an error to the error callback.
        Parameters:
        query - - Specify the input query object.
        callback - - handler to be fired upon server response.
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • executeForCount

        public final Deferred executeForCount(Query query)
        Get a count of the number of features that satisfy the input query. Valid only for layers published using ArcGIS Server 10 SP1 or greater. Layers published with earlier versions of ArcGIS Server return an error to the error callback.
        Parameters:
        query - - Specify the input query object.
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • executeForIds

        public final Deferred executeForIds(Query parameters,
                     QueryTaskIdsCallback callback)
        Executes a Query against an ArcGIS Server map layer. The result is returned as an array of ints.
        Parameters:
        parameters - - Specifies the attributes and spatial filter of the query.
        callback - - handler to be fired upon server response.
        Returns:
        Deferred

      • addCompleteHandler

        public final void addCompleteHandler(QueryTaskCompleteHandler handler)
        Add handler for when complete event fires.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the query operation is complete.

      • addErrorHandler

        public final void addErrorHandler(ErrorHandler handler)
        Add handler for when error event fires.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when an error occurs when executing the task.

      • addExecuteForCountCompleteHandler

        public final void addExecuteForCountCompleteHandler(QueryTaskCountHandler handler)
        Add handler for when count complete event fires.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Fires when the query for the count is complete. This event is only available for layers published using ArcGIS Server 10 SP1 or later.

      • addExecuteForIdsCompleteHandler

        Add handler for when execute for ids complete event fires.

        handler - - Fires when the query on IDs is complete.
